name: avsync.live-benchmark
description: Works with public github urls, github gists, and files on google drive (once authenticated).

scripts.test: kill $(lsof -t -i:8838) & npm run server:test & cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.timeline-viewer-server:dev: npm run generate-sw-dev && open-cli http://localhost:8833/ && npm run server
scripts.start: npm run benchmark-report-server:prod && npm run timeline-viewer-server:prod
scripts.dev: npm run benchmark-report-server:dev && npm run timeline-viewer-server:dev
scripts.generate-sw-dev: npm run generate-sw && npm run checkout-sw
scripts.generate-sw-prod: npm run generate-sw && npm run commit-sw
scripts.commit-sw: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain -uno)" ]; then git commit -am "generate service-worker"; fi

author: AVsync.LIVE
